柏油便（tarry stool）（Tarry stool）：上消化道或小肠出血并在肠内停留时间较长，则因红细胞破坏后，血红蛋白在肠道内与硫化物结合形成硫化亚 …

entry.def: If you tarry somewhere, you stay there longer than you meant to and delay leaving.

example.ex: Two old boys tarried on the street corner discussing cattle.
example.tran: 两个大男孩在街角停留许久，一直在讨论牛。

entry.tran: 柏油含量高的;像柏油的
entry.def: If you describe something as tarry, you mean that it has a lot of tar in it or is like tar.

example.tran: 我闻到了柏油熔化了的味道。
